H0.text: What colour are Hydrangea flowers in acidic soil . Pink

H1.text: What colour are Hydrangea flowers in acidic soil . Purple

H2.text: What colour are Hydrangea flowers in acidic soil . Red

H3.text: What colour are Hydrangea flowers in acidic soil . BLUE

A4.text: In acidic soil (pH below 7), H. macrophylla and H. serrata cultivars produce flowers that are blue to purple due to available aluminium ions

A5.text: Soil with a pH of 5.5 or lower will produce blue flowers
